abstract_summ: In this article, we analyze the growth pattern of Covid-19 pandemic in India from March 4th to May 15th using regression analysis (exponential and polynomial), auto-regressive integrated moving averages (ARIMA) model as well as Exponential Smoothing and Holt-Winters models . The forecasting results of COVID-19 are alarming for May in Pakistan . The health officials and government should adopt new strategies to control the pandemic from further spread .
